articles.title: Rising K-pop stars introduce themselves at Mnet Asian Music Awards - Associated Press

articles.title: Car bursts into flames in Hougang, sends 3 teens fleeing - AsiaOne
articles.description: Three teens made a quick escape after the car they were in burst into flames in Hougang last Saturday (Dec 11) afternoon. The sedan caught fire while it was parked near the unloading area of an HDB block along Hougang Street 92. A resident told Shin Min Daily…
articles.content:

articles.title: Philippines gets $250-M ADB loan for vaccine purchases - Philstar.com
articles.description: The Asian Development Bank would lend $250 million to the Philippines to boost the national government’s vaccine procurement efforts.
articles.content:
MANILA, Philippines — The Asian Development Bank would lend $250 million to the Philippines to boost the national government’s vaccine procurement efforts.

articles.title: 2 lions break free of container at Changi Airport, sedated after stand-off - AsiaOne

articles.description: Non-fungible tokens are helping Southeast Asian artists to make lucrative sales, and democratise art.
